response.original_title: Tom Crosbie: Actions Speak Louder Than Nerds
response.overview: Tom Crosbie is smarter, funnier, and more delightfully dextrous than can easily be explained, even by the copious amounts of time he spends practicing such things. His show will be a treat, like hot chocolate with marshmallows in a Nintendo mug. Tom is an action hero, if we count vigorously doing things with Rubik's cubes as action. If not, he's still a lovely nerd. So, to be clear, he's basically a lovely nerd. OK?
response.title: Tom Crosbie: Actions Speak Louder Than Nerds
